DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter , two-arm , parallel , randomize phase 4 study compare compliance diabetes type 2 patient treated Glucophage sachet versus patient treated Glucophage tablet .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Adherence Treatment With Glucophage Sachets Versus Tablets Diabetes Type 2 Patients Previously Treated With Metformin Tablets
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus type 2 diagnose ( Baseline Glycemia > 7,0 mmol/L ( 126 mg/dL ) overload Glycemia > 11,0 mmol/L ( 198 mg/dL ) On treatment metformin tablet Patients least 2 treated comorbidities Established dose Metformin > 1.700 mg/day Age > 18 year old Given inform consent Patients able take medication orally According Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) Participating another clinical trial 30 day prior randomization Any illness medical psychiatric condition , severe uncontrolled could interfere patient 's participation assessment study result
